member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageDataB
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageData
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageFilename
member.summary: This property contains location of a scanned image of the back of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BackImageReferenceKey
member.summary: A designator assigned by the ECE institution that uniquely identifies the BackImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDAccountNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the depository account at the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDBranch
member.summary: A code that identifies the branch at the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDConversionIndicator
member.summary: A code that indicates the conversion within the processing institution between original paper check, image, and IRD.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDRoutingNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the Bank of First Deposit.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.BOFDTruncator
member.summary: Identifies if this BOFD is the truncator of the original check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.CanRecreateImages
member.summary: A code that indicates whether the sender has the ability to recreate the check images (from the original source) for the duration of the agreed to rentention timeframe.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageCreationDate
member.summary: Date assigned by the image creator for the image contained in FrontImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageDataB
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageData
member.summary: This property contains the scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageFilename
member.summary: This property contains location of a scanned image of the front of the physical check, in the format specified by ImageFormat and compressed using the designated ImageCompression .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.FrontImageReferenceKey
member.summary: A designator assigned by the ECE institution that uniquely identifies the FrontImageData .

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageCompression
member.summary: A code that identifies the algorithm or method used to compress the images tored in the FrontImageData and BackImageData properties.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageCreatorRoutingNumber
member.summary: A number that identifies the financial institution that created the image (if different from BOFDRoutingNumber ).

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.ImageFormat
member.summary: A code that identifies the type of image format used for the images contained in the FrontImageData and BackImageData properties.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.MICRAuxOnUs
member.summary: A code used on commercial checks at the discretion of the payor bank, read off of the MICR line on a check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.MICROnUs
member.summary: Account number data specified by the payor bank and read from the MICR line on a check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.MICRProcessingCode
member.summary: The external processing code from the MICR line of a check, if present.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.MICRRoutingNumber
member.summary: Payor bank routing number, read from the MICR line of a check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.PayeeName
member.summary: The name of the payee from the check.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.CheckDetail.SequenceNumber
member.summary: ECE Institution Item Sequence Number, asigned by the institution that creates the file.

member.name: M:nsoftware.InPay.FTPConnection.#ctor

member.summary: The password to login with.

member.summary: The name of the file as it will appear on the server after upload.

member.summary: The domain name or IP address of the FTP server the file is to be uploaded to.

member.summary: The current path on the FTP server.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.FTPConnection.RemotePort
member.summary: The port for the FTP service (default is 21).

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.FTPConnection.Timeout
member.summary: A timeout to use when uploading via FTP.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.FTPConnection.User
member.summary: The user id to login as.

member.summary: The issuer of the certificate.

member.summary: The private key of the certificate (if available).

member.summary: Shows whether a PrivateKey is available for the selected certificate.

member.summary: The name of the PrivateKey container for the certificate (if available).

member.summary: The length of the certificate public key (in bits).

member.summary: The serial number of the certificate encoded as a string.

member.summary: Textual description of the signature algorithm of the certificate.

member.summary: The name of the certificate store for the client certificate.

member.summary: The name of the certificate store for the client certificate.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.Certificate.StorePassword

member.summary: This property is used to tell the component which type of authorization to perform when connecting to the proxy.

member.summary: This property tells the component whether or not to automatically detect and use proxy system settings, if available.

member.summary: This property contains a password if authentication is to be used for the proxy.

member.summary: This property contains the TCP port for the proxy Server (default 80).

member.summary: If a proxy Server is given, then the HTTP request is sent to the proxy instead of the server otherwise specified.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.Proxy.SSL
member.summary: This property determines when to use SSL for the connection to the proxy.

member.name: P:nsoftware.InPay.Proxy.User

member.summary: Contains an authorization code when a transaction has been approved.

member.summary: Indicates the status of the last transaction.
